docs.lead_paragraph: IN the cool of late evening a family sat about playing word games. One large lamp on a table lit the scene. Suddenly through the open window of the high-up apartment, a large brown moth flew in, hitting the lampshade with a smack.
docs.abstract: D Barclay on stimulating interest in nature study
docs.snippet: IN the cool of late evening a family sat about playing word games. One large lamp on a table lit the scene. Suddenly through the open window of the high-up apartment, a large brown moth flew in, hitting the lampshade with a smack.
